meanings.definition: Ethylenediaminetetraacetates: a chemical compound used as a chelating agent in various industrial processes.
meanings.sent1: The ethylenediaminetetraacetates helped remove metal ions from the solution.
meanings.sent2: Industries rely on ethylenediaminetetraacetates for their chelating properties.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled ethylenediaminetetraacetates into the experiment, causing a colorful reaction.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to coordinate multiple tasks smoothly was likened to the action of ethylenediaminetetraacetates in binding metal ions.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of ethylenediaminetetraacetates lingered in the lab, reminding everyone of its presence.
